name: Format the header and payload
func:
msg.headers = {
    "Content-Type": "multipart/form-data; boundary=------------------------d74496d66958873e"
}


msg.payload = '--------------------------d74496d66958873e\r\n'+
'Content-Disposition: form-data; name="select"\r\n'+
'\r\n'+
'true\r\n'+
'--------------------------d74496d66958873e\r\n'+
'Content-Disposition: form-data; name="print"\r\n'+
'\r\n'+
'false\r\n'+
'--------------------------d74496d66958873e\r\n'+
'Content-Disposition: form-data; name="file"; filename="'+msg.filename+'"\r\n'+
'Content-Type: application/octet-stream\r\n'+
'\r\n'+
msg.payload+'\r\n'+
'--------------------------d74496d66958873e--\r\n';


return msg;

msg.filename = msg.payload
return msg;

name: print check

func: rbe

name: To send options when dashboard connects
Let gauge to be initialized before change any options
info: There will be browser errors otherwise

name: Change the options
info:
gauge scales according to predefined card size
defined font sizes are not absolute values but minimum values
For example if you make your gauge smaller, the changed font sizes may happen to be too large and will overlap.

minLabelMinFontSize - minimum size of min field // number
maxLabelMinFontSize - minimum size of max field // number
labelMinFontSize - minimum size of units field // numbert

delete msg.payload cos it does not contain proper value

name: random
func:
msg.payload = Math.random()*10
return msg;
